posts.post_content:
Posted By: Iggy...
This LOT of T206 cards WAS SOLD!

Price for the lot is $225 which includes shipping. 
NO Paypal, unless you want to splilt the 3% fee, checks or money orders are fine.

All fifteen cards have nice eye appeal but the backs have some flaws as seen on the pic's.  Mostly crease-free with the exception of corner creases on the Starr, F. Smith, Oakes, and Overall cards.  Bid with confidence and good luck!
